segments.text: The kitchen layout shows the sink on the right with cabinets opposite.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman faces left while handling a plate with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink frames a view of the garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows steadily from the faucet into the full basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It spills over, creating a sheet down the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy uses a two-step stool to access the upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar inside is labeled clearly and filled.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate while grabbing cookies with his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs spread unevenly, suggesting instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a girl raises her arm toward the jar expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly on the counter beside the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overall scene captures a typical household activity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains on the window are tied back neatly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lower cabinets have water trickling down their doors.
segments.speaker: PAR
